parameters.name: Message
parameters.query:
where type == 'microsoft.logic/workflows' 
| summarize Selected = countif(id in ({LogicApps:value})), Total = count()
| extend Selected = iff(Selected > 200, 200, Selected)
| project Message = strcat('# ', Selected, ' / ', Total)

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where Category == "WorkflowRuntime" 
| project workflowId_s, status_s, Type, code_s, error_code_s, error_message_s, TimeGenerated, TenantId, SubscriptionId, startTime_t, ResourceType, ResourceProvider,ResourceId, ResourceGroup, resource_workflowName_s, resource_workflowId_g, resource_triggerName_s, resource_subscriptionId_g,resource_runId_s, resource_resourceGroupName_s, resource_location_s, Resource, OperationName, Level, correlation_clientTrackingId_s, Category, _ResourceId
| where workflowId_s in~ ({LogicApps}) or '*' in~ ({LogicApps})
| where status_s in ({Status}) or '*' in ({Status})
| where Level in ({Level}) or '*' in ({Level})
| extend Details=pack_all()
| extend TimeFromNow = now() - TimeGenerated
| extend TimeAgo = strcat(case(TimeFromNow < 2m, strcat(toint(TimeFromNow / 1m), ' seconds'), TimeFromNow < 2h, strcat(toint(TimeFromNow / 1m), ' minutes'), TimeFromNow < 2d, strcat(toint(TimeFromNow / 1h), ' hours'), strcat(toint(TimeFromNow / 1d), ' days')), ' ago') 
| project LogicApp=workflowId_s, Details, Status=status_s, Level, OperationName, Code=code_s, Error=error_code_s, ErrorMessage=error_message_s, ["Time"]=strcat('🕒', TimeAgo)
